content: do you have christmas decorations and gifts on your mind the crochet santa gnome is sure to be a hit for both the young and old when it comes to celebrating the holidays whether using him as a special gift for play or holiday decoration he s sure to bring holiday cheer pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference important images for construction within the pattern and all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease regular single_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet bobble working in the back bar of the chain and the adjustable magic ring optional materials needed + to complete the santa gnome you will need yarn in your choice of colors about 189 yds/173 m total of worsted/aran and about 38 yds/35 m of fur yarn a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers tapestry needle stuffing pins and scissors finished measurements + in the sitting position without the hat the santa gnome measures approximately 4 5 inches/11 4 cm sitting with the hat measures approximately 7 inches/18 cm with a bent hat and 10 inches/25 cm with a straight hat not including the legs thank you
